688510.name: World of Speed - Subaru BRZ
688510.description:
Add an exclusive Japanese sports car Subaru BRZ to your collection. In addition to the car, the DLC includes a unique color scheme and a set of premium bonuses.

Subaru BRZ is a rear-wheel drive sports car coupe, the result of joint development of Subaru and Toyota. The car is based on the line of the classic Japanese sports coupe and is their spiritual successor.

In World of Speed, Subaru BRZ is starting level collectible car, which allows beginners to feel confident on the track due to good handling and stability. Experienced drivers can use the advantage of the rear-drive layout and excellent drift qualities.

This collectible car is available exclusively as part of early access. It will not be possible to receive it after the full release of the game.

The DLC includes:
  • Subaru BRZ collectible car
  • Unique color scheme
  • 5000 Credits (standard game currency)
  • 1500 Diamonds (premium game currency)
  • 15 days of Premium Account (an amount of received credits, experience and dealer reputation is increased to 150%)
688510.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
